title: Forbidden Casks Error Message
body:
### `brew doctor` output

```shell
% brew doctor
Your system is ready to brew.
```


### Verification

- [X] My "`brew doctor` output" above says `Your system is ready to brew.` and am still able to reproduce my issue.
- [X] I ran `brew update` twice and am still able to reproduce my issue.
- [X] This issue's title and/or description do not reference a single formula e.g. `brew install wget`. If they do, open an issue at https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/issues/new/choose instead.

### `brew config` output

```shell
% brew config
HOMEBREW_VERSION: 4.3.10
ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew
HEAD: c3ae0327c01aab461531bfc0fcdfb4dd3a779205
Last commit: 8 days ago
Core tap JSON: 26 Jul 19:31 UTC
Core cask tap JSON: 26 Jul 19:31 UTC
HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /opt/homebrew
HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY: /opt/homebrew/Homebrew
HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: []
HOMEBREW_CLEANUP_MAX_AGE_DAYS: 90
HOMEBREW_FAIL_LOG_LINES: 30
HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_CASKS: anaconda
HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_FORMULAE: anaconda
HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE: â›ª
HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 8
Homebrew Ruby: 3.3.3 => /opt/homebrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/3.3.3/bin/ruby
CPU: octa-core 64-bit arm_firestorm_icestorm
Clang: 15.0.0 build 1500
Git: 2.39.3 => /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/git
Curl: 8.6.0 => /usr/bin/curl
macOS: 14.5-arm64
CLT: 15.3.0.0.1.1708646388
Xcode: N/A
Rosetta 2: false
```


### What were you trying to do (and why)?

Greetings!

After running [Homebrew Environment.zsh](https://github.com/dan-snelson/Jamf-Pro-Scripts/blob/development/Homebrew/Homebrew%20Environment.zsh), [anaconda](https://formulae.brew.sh/cask/anaconda) is blocked as expected, but the error message contains a typo:

```
Error: Cask 'anaconda' has been The installation of anaconda was forbidden by you
in `HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_CASKS`.
```



### What happened (include all command output)?

```
% brew install anaconda
==> Downloading https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask/c4b1699c487919c77dab6ad6ceb7820f4732911
######################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Downloading https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2024.06-1-MacOSX-arm64.sh
Already downloaded: /Users/dan/Library/Caches/Homebrew/downloads/ff800697661f2bbaceb45fedfa39dcf2c7169bb59d5a93bca1c3efc1676c57d0--Anaconda3-2024.06-1-MacOSX-arm64.sh
Error: Cask 'anaconda' has been The installation of anaconda was forbidden by you
in `HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_CASKS`.
```

### What did you expect to happen?

I expected an error message similar to the following:

```
% brew install anaconda
==> Downloading https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask/c4b1699c487919c77dab6ad6ceb7820f4732911
######################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Downloading https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2024.06-1-MacOSX-arm64.sh
Already downloaded: /Users/dan/Library/Caches/Homebrew/downloads/ff800697661f2bbaceb45fedfa39dcf2c7169bb59d5a93bca1c3efc1676c57d0--Anaconda3-2024.06-1-MacOSX-arm64.sh
Error: Cask 'anaconda' is included in `HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_CASKS`; its installation is forbidden.
```

### Step-by-step reproduction instructions (by running `brew` commands)

```shell
% brew install anaconda
==> Downloading https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/homebrew-cask/c4b1699c487919c77dab6ad6ceb7820f4732911
######################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Downloading https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2024.06-1-MacOSX-arm64.sh
Already downloaded: /Users/dan/Library/Caches/Homebrew/downloads/ff800697661f2bbaceb45fedfa39dcf2c7169bb59d5a93bca1c3efc1676c57d0--Anaconda3-2024.06-1-MacOSX-arm64.sh
Error: Cask 'anaconda' has been The installation of anaconda was forbidden by you
in `HOMEBREW_FORBIDDEN_CASKS`.
```
